hiveArticle.title: Grand Flower Bouquet at UB City Mall
hiveArticle.body:
Below image is of a Grand Flower Bouquet at UB City Mall in Bangalore. What I mostly like about this bouquet is the colour combination. You can also see water colour is also red which gives this Bouquet a nice texture all together. The height of this is nearly 6 Feet along with the Stool where it was kept.

![IMG_20171119_143618.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1511351496/dmzfniwpejk8fsoriapn.jpg)
